page.title: 13Housing Survey
page.content: We carried out a survey of houses in Abergavenny.It was found that the most popular type of housing in our area was semi-detached followed by detached, terraced,flats and maisonettes. The oldest houses were nearest to the centre of town dating back to Victorian times and some even to the 18th century As one moves out of town the houses get younger having been built between the two World Wars or after 1945.The most modern houses have been built on estates around the outskirts of town The most common size of house was the 3 bedroom but many detached houses had more while terraced houses had less. The most popular type of material for building houses was brick with four times as many as stone and very few being constructed of other materials.
